org.picocontainer
Interface Injector<T>

All Superinterfaces:
ComponentAdapter<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractInjector, AnnotatedFieldInjector, AnnotatedMethodInjector, CompositeInjector, ConstructorInjector, FactoryInjector, IterativeInjector, MethodInjector, MethodInjector.ByReflectionMethod, MultiInjector, NamedFieldInjector, NamedMethodInjector, ProviderAdapter, SetterInjector, SingleMemberInjector, TypedFieldInjector
public interface Injector<T>
extends ComponentAdapter<T>

Implementers are responsible for instantiating and injecting dependancies into Constructors, Methods and Fields.
